channel.title: [562] Jagex scape source requesting help[562]
channel.description: This is the thing that when u click to attack somone the character walks to the target before they start attacking if im using melee,i wanna change so u can do as in real rs and many other sources that u can rush like when u hit with ur d claws some feets away from the target,how do i change that? and one more thing how do i change that when ur opponent dies in pvp it drops he's gear that he had equipt and also so u can pick it up,so it won't drop any random pvp gear. Hope someone will help me would appreciate it alot.

item.title: [562] Jagex scape source requesting help[562]

item.description:
@jockedaman wrote:

This is the thing that when u click to attack somone the character walks to the target before they start attacking if im using melee,i wanna change so u can do as in real rs and many other sources that u can rush like when u hit with ur d claws some feets away from the target,how do i change that?
and one more thing how do i change that when ur opponent dies in pvp it drops he’s gear that he had equipt and also so u can pick it up,so it won’t drop any random pvp gear.
Hope someone will help me would appreciate it alot.
